title: Autonomous Single App Mode (com.apple.asam)
description: The payload that configures Autonomous Single App mode.

items.title: Allowed Application Item
items.description: A dictionary that specifies an app that can be granted access to the Accessibilty APIs.

BundleIdentifier.title: Bundle Identifier
BundleIdentifier.description: The unique bundle identifier. If two dictionaries contain the same 'BundleIdentifier' value but a different 'TeamIdentifier' value, an error occurs and the profile won't be installed.

TeamIdentifier.title: Team Identifier
TeamIdentifier.description: The developer's team identifier that the system used when it signed the app.

AllowedApplications.title: Allowed Applications
AllowedApplications.description: An array of dictionaries that specifies the apps that the system grants access to the Accessibility APIs.
